lines.gurmukhi: sPl ibrK Pl dyq ijau pwKwn mwry; isir krvq sih gih pwir pwir hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a tree laden with fruit drops fruit to the person who throws stone at it, then it bears the pain of a saw on its head and in the form of a raft or boat takes the iron saw across the river;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Pldwr ibrC ijs qrHwˆ pKwn p`Qr v`tw mwirAwˆ ault ky mwrx hwry nUM Pl id`qw krdw hY ArQwq duK dyvy dw aultw Blw kqÎw krdw hY[ qy nwl hI Pyr ieh ibrC isr aupr krvq Awry dw cIr shwr ky cIrx vwly dw Es dy sMgI Awid mnu`K mwqR nUM hI gih lY ky Apxy au`qy vw byVI rUpho Awpxy AMdr sÍwr kr ky pwir ndIEˆ lMGOˆdw qwrdw hoXw pwir prly iknwry qy pwr kr idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: swgr mY kwiF muKu PorIAq sIp ky ijau; dyq mukqwhl AvigAw n bIcwir hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as an oyster is taken out of the sea, is broken and it yields a pearl to the one who breaks it open and feels not the insult that it faces;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ smuMdR ivcoˆ is`p nUM k`Fky mrjIaUVw = toBw mUMh aus dw PoVdw hY, qy auh is`p ApxI AvigAw inrwdr qwVnw nUM nw icqwr ky sgoˆ Es nUM moqI dy idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Knvwrw Kwin Knq hnq Gn; mwnk hIrw Amol praupkwr hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a labourer strives the ore in a mine with his shovel and pick-axe and the mine rewards him with precious stones and diamonds;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Knvwrw Kwxwˆ pu`tn vwlw Kwx nUM pu`tdw hoXw Gn hnq vdwn qy vdwn mwrdw hY, qy Kwx Es dy Apkwr BYVqweI nUM nw icqwr ky Agoˆ Amolk Amolvyˆ mxIAwˆ rqn jÍwhr qy hIirAwˆ Awid dw pRswd Arp ky Es aupr aupkwr krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: aUK mY ipaUK ijau pRgws hoq kolU pcY; Avgun kIey gun swDn kY duAwr hY [326[

Unknown.translation: Just as sweet nectar-like juice is extracted out by putting it through a crusher, so are the evil-doers treated with sympathy and welfare by the true and saintly persons when they come to them. (326)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ kolU ivc pcY pIiVAwˆ aUK gMny ivcoˆ ipaUK rs rhu rUp AMimRq prgws hoq pRgt hoXw aupijAw krdw hY, iesy qrHwˆ hI AOgux kIiqAwˆ gux krnw burw krn vwly dw Blw krnw swDwˆ gurU ikAwˆ is`Kwˆ sMqwˆ dy duAwry swD sMgiq ivKy hI pwieAw jwˆdw hY ]326]
